column4: how can I install different versions of the same program in different folders, and how can I issue different command to choose which to run?
what program are you talking of?
depending on the program..you could use the ubuntu alernatives system...(update-alternatives)

gourmet recipe manager. I had an older version installed and tried to install from source using a python script . I've have tried to purge and reinstall but now I always get an error stating a missing file
